Package com.mendeley.api.network

    Interface Description
    Environment  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DeleteNetworkTask
    A NetworkTask specialised for making HTTP DELETE requests.
    DocumentNetworkProvider
    NetworkProvider class for Documents API calls
    FileNetworkProvider
    NetworkProvider class for Files API calls
    FolderNetworkProvider
    NetworkProvider class for Folder API calls
    GetNetworkTask
    A NetworkTask specialised for making HTTP GET requests.
    GroupNetworkProvider
    NetworkProvider class for Group API calls
    JsonParser
    This class hold methods to parse json strings to model objects as well as create json strings from objects that are used by the NetwrokProvider classes.
    NetworkProvider  
    NetworkTask  
    NetworkUtils
    Utilities for the NetworkProviders.
    NullRequest
    A placeholder for a RequestHandle.
    PostNetworkTask  
    ProfileNetworkProvider
    NetworkProvider class for Profile API calls
    UtilsNetworkProvider
